fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget
head_office_address: Suite 3101, Central Plaza 18 Harbour Road, Wanchai
eu_initiatives: Dr. Lance Noble has requested a meeting with Mr. Miguel Ceballos Baron from Commissioner Cecilia Malmstrom's cabinet. Mr. Ceballos Baron has agreed to meet with me in his office at 10 am on Thursday, 15th February pending approval of Gavekal's inclusion in the transparency register. The purpose of the meeting would be to discuss recent developments in cybersecurity in China, impact on China's business environment for European firms and how international firms and governments view these developments. Dr. Noble would also share the findings of my research on this topic to date, including feedback from companies and other governments that he has already met with.
membership: European Chamber of Commerce in China
relevant_communication: The outcome of the proposed meeting would be to provide both Mr. Ceballos Baron and Dr. Noble with a better understanding of issues of relevance to European commercial interests in China and bilateral political relations. The final report that Dr. Noble is writing will also be shared with Mr. Ceballos Baron and officials at the EU Delegation in Beijing, among others. As with the report on the Made in China 2025 initiative that Dr. Lance Noble previously wrote for the European Chamber of Commerce in China, it is expected that this report will provide the European Commission with relevant information it could choose to consider as it drafts its own policies.
goals__remit: Provides analysis of economic trends to investors and companies about global economic trends, consumer behaviour and industrial developments.
